General.Name: HengFeng Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hengfeng Information Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a smart city information technology service provider in China. The company provides smart city industry solutions for customers in the fields of urban services, public safety, and people's livelihood. It offers design consultation, software development, system integration and management, and operation and maintenance services. The company also provides smart government software, smart building software, industry software, IOT products, smart city operation management platform, and smart retirement solutions. Hengfeng Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Fuzhou, China.
